definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: Eye protection is provided for your safety and must be worn.

sentences.english: Use the products should be worn when good protective glasses and rubber glove.

sentences.english: Wore protective clothing, thick gloves, safety glasses, Keep unproductive personal at a distance.

sentences.english: The evaporator also only used by briefed persons, you have to wear safety glasses.

sentences.english: Eye Protection: Wear goggles when working with liquids.

sentences.english: She makes sure to wear special protective glasses and gloves when making soap.

sentences.english: For your personal protection, we recommend that you wear safety glasses.

sentences.english: Eight, drive in long-term snow mushroom, the navigator had better wear protecting glasses.

sentences.english: Avoid looking at the laser light without the protective goggles.

definition: to put on/to wear (mouthguard, contact lenses, hearing aid etc)
